Comment: Colombia: bakurə; also means 'baby' 02.270; 02.280. *Chibchan form is *'c̷id. *Chibchan diminutive suffix is *-'aara.
Colombia: bakurə; also means 'baby' 02.270; 02.280. *Chibchan form is *'c̷id. *Chibchan diminutive suffix is *-'aara.
Colombia: kačirə. *Chibchan forms for 'at, in' are *ska; *ki; *sa; *ka.
Colombia: kirə; 'gʷaykəbə, latter is command form. *Chibchan forms are *'da- and *'di-.
Colombia: kayrə, refers to the 'roof', because the house is all roof 07.510. *Chibchan form is *'hu.
Colombia: ʔaanə. *Chibchan form is *a'ra. *Chibchan for 'egg, sprout, suckling' is *'pu.
Colombia: šibarə. *Chibchan form for 'sprout, suckling, egg' presumably referring to shape or space, is *'pu.
Cf. 'eye' 04.210. Colombia: ʔoškək, means 'close eyes'. *Chibchan form is *kap-.
Cf. 'eye' 04.210. Colombia: ʔoškək, means 'close eyes'. *Chibchan form is *kap-.
Colombia: bidiinə; 'shin' is kaynə. *Chibchan form is *ka'ra.
Colombia: ʔabakok-bisanə. Cf. 'small' 12.560 (?). *Chibchan form is *'ku, also 'hand'.
Colombia: ʔakdurə; ʔaxdurə. *Chibchan forms are *'ku; *'kui-ki; *ata; and *guLa.
Colombia: ʔakdu obanə, refers to joint of hand.
Colombia: bisa-obanə, refers to joint of arm.
Colombia: bisanə; 'upper arm' is kokdəʔ bisanə. *Chibchan form is *'kui-ki, also means 'hand'.
Colombia: kobɨnə; kobɨɨnə. *Chibchan form is *pkuʔ or *'pkua.
Colombia: sayʔbərə; 'crown of head' is dok'banə. *Chibchan form is *'c̷ã.
Colombia: sayʔbərə; 'crown of head' is dok'banə. *Chibchan form is *'c̷ã.
Colombia: katunə; 'long hair' is kããtunə. *Chibchan form is *'c̷ã.
Colombia: a 'tortoise' is dašuunə. *Chibchan forms are *kui; and *u'li.

'White-faced monkey' is baraši; 'spider m.' is sugša; 'howler m.' is boro. Colombia: koʔčikbanə, refers to a 'cebus m.'; 'howler m.' is 'kaminə; 'spider m.' is šugšanə. *Chibchan form for 'spider monkey' is *dõ; *do-. *Chibchan 'white-faced monkey' is *hoki.
Refers to the 'spectacle' bear (Tremarctos ornatus), also called dogribara; lolóra.
Generic term for all types of ducks.
Colombia: ʔa; ʔi(?), respectively: 'he/she'; 'it'. *Chibchan forms are *a and *i-.
Colombia: bai. *Chibchan form is *'baʔ; second person prefix is *bi-.
Colombia: nay. *Chibchan form is *'da; first person prefix is *dã-.
Colombia: bakurə, also means 'small' 12.560. *Chibchan form is *'uaʔ-. Also means 'young (of an animal)'.
Also means 'tree/wood' 01.420. Colombia: kããnə. *Chibchan form is *'buʔ.
Verbal form is dihkaga andyikan. Colombia: dʸikayrə.
Colombia: ba'dunə, refers to 'clouds at rest'. *Chibchan form is *'bõ; *bo-.
Colombia: ʔaynə; a 'huge rock' is dʸirorə. *Chibchan form is *'haki.
Colombia: ʔaynə; a 'huge rock' is dʸirorə. *Chibchan form is *'haki.
Colombia: badoonə, refers to 'still water'; cf. 'lake'. 01.330
'Stream' is darikū; tumm'manā; 'brook' is tuīnibā. Colombia: bokyirə, refers to 'moving water'; Colombia 'stream' is i'tooboki.
Colombia: badoonə, refers to 'still water'. *Chibchan form is *ya'ba.
Colombia: šimənə. *Chibchan form is *'diʔ. *Chibchan forms for 'liquid' are *di- and *'li.
Colombia: maynə. *Chibchan forms are *sũ and *'guaki. Cf. also 'know' 17.170.
Colombia: ʔisčugdərə, especially for fishing; 'to pierce (with spear)' is danə. *Chibchan form for 'spear, stick' is *'c̷ã. See 'stab' 09.223.
